name: Bunny Pop: Rescue Puzzle
description:
Bunny Pop is super fun & highly addictive match game that’ll keep you playing for hours!
Join Bunny on a colorful forest adventure bursting with a number of challenges!
Your efforts will be rewarded, so hop to it and bubble shoot your way to victory!

HOW TO PLAY
• Tap on 2 or more cubes of the same color which are adjacent to each other.
• Special boosters & items to help you pass trickier levels.
• Pop all the Cubes with a minimal touch to score higher.
• No rush! There are no time limits.

FEATURES
• Numerous boosters and updates!
• The water level will rise with special potions, enabling the blocks to float!
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy the puzzle game anytime, anywhere!

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 300 levels with uniquely amazing challenges!
- Explore the beautiful bright world with Bunny!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master

• Daily Spin!
- Earn daily rewards to help you out!

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Play anytime, anywhere!

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- Enjoy the game offline.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing soundtrack and gorgeous visual effects

NOTES
 • Bunny Pop is available on mobile phones & tablet PCs.
• Bunny Pop contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Bunny Pop is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins.

E-MAIL
• help@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE
• https://www.bitmango.com/

Time to pop!
Thank you!
